006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLEventReader2;
011import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamReader2;
012
013import java.io.IOException;
014import java.util.HashMap;
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Set;
017import java.util.regex.Pattern;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import java.util.stream.IntStream;
020
021import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
022import javax.xml.stream.Location;
023import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamConstants;
024import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
025import javax.xml.stream.events.Characters;
026import javax.xml.stream.events.EndElement;
027import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
028import javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent;
029
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
031import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
032
033public final class XmlEventUtil { // NOPMD this is a set of utility methods
034  private static final Pattern WHITESPACE_ONLY = Pattern.compile("^\\s+$");
035
036  private static final Map<Integer, String> EVENT_NAME_MAP = new HashMap<>(); // NOPMD - this value is immutable
037
038  static {
039    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.START_ELEMENT, "START_ELEMENT");
040    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.END_ELEMENT, "END_ELEMENT");
041    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION, "PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION");
042    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.CHARACTERS, "CHARACTERS");
043    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.COMMENT, "COMMENT");
044    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.SPACE, "SPACE");
045    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.START_DOCUMENT, "START_DOCUMENT");
046    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.END_DOCUMENT, "END_DOCUMENT");
047    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.ENTITY_REFERENCE, "ENTITY_REFERENCE");
048    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.ATTRIBUTE, "ATTRIBUTE");
049    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.DTD, "DTD");
050    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.CDATA, "CDATA");
051    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.NAMESPACE, "XML_NAMESPACE");
052    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.NOTATION_DECLARATION, "NOTATION_DECLARATION");
053    EVENT_NAME_MAP.put(XMLStreamConstants.ENTITY_DECLARATION, "ENTITY_DECLARATION");
054  }
055
056  private XmlEventUtil() {
057    // disable construction
058  }
059
060  @SuppressWarnings("null")
061  @NonNull
062  private static Object escape(@NonNull String data) {
063    return data.chars()
064        .mapToObj(c -> (char) c)
065        .map(XmlEventUtil::escape).collect(Collectors.joining());
066  }
067
068  @SuppressWarnings("null")
069  @NonNull
070  private static String escape(char ch) {
071    String retval;
072    switch (ch) {
073    case '\n':
074      retval = "\\n";
075      break;
076    case '\r':
077      retval = "\\r";
078      break;
079    default:
080      retval = String.valueOf(ch);
081      break;
082    }
083    return retval;
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Generate a message suitable for logging that describes the provided
088   * {@link XMLEvent}.
089   *
090   * @param xmlEvent
091   *          the XML event to generate the message for
092   * @return the message
093   */
094  @NonNull
095  public static CharSequence toString(XMLEvent xmlEvent) {
096    CharSequence retval;
097    if (xmlEvent == null) {
098      retval = "EOF";
099    } else {
100      @SuppressWarnings("null")
101      @NonNull
102      StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder()
103          .append(toEventName(xmlEvent));
104      QName name = toQName(xmlEvent);
105      if (name != null) {
106        builder.append(": ").append(name.toString());
107      }
108      if (xmlEvent.isCharacters()) {
109        String text = xmlEvent.asCharacters().getData();
110        if (text != null) {
111          builder.append(" '").append(escape(text)).append('\'');
112        }
113      }
114      Location location = toLocation(xmlEvent);
115      if (location != null) {
116        builder.append(" at ").append(toString(location));
117      }
118      retval = builder;
119    }
120    return retval;
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Generates a message for the provided {@link Location}.
125   *
126   * @param location
127   *          the location to generate the message for
128   * @return the message
129   */
130  @SuppressWarnings("null")
131  @NonNull
132  public static CharSequence toString(@Nullable Location location) {
133    return location == null ? "unknown"
134        : new StringBuilder()
135            .append(location.getLineNumber())
136            .append(':')
137            .append(location.getColumnNumber());
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Generates a string containing the current event and location of the stream
142   * reader.
143   *
144   * @param reader
145   *          the XML event stream reader
146   * @return the generated string
147   */
148  @NonNull
149  public static CharSequence toString(@NonNull XMLStreamReader2 reader) { // NO_UCD (unused code)
150    int type = reader.getEventType();
151
152    @SuppressWarnings("null")
153    @NonNull
154    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder().append(toEventName(type));
155    QName name = reader.getName();
156    if (name != null) {
157      builder.append(": ").append(name.toString());
158    }
159    if (XMLStreamConstants.CHARACTERS == type) {
160      String text = reader.getText();
161      if (text != null) {
162        builder.append(" '").append(escape(text)).append('\'');
163      }
164    }
165    Location location = reader.getLocation();
166    if (location != null) {
167      builder.append(" at ").append(toString(location));
168    }
169    return builder;
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Retrieve the resource location of {@code event}.
174   *
175   * @param event
176   *          the XML event to identify the location for
177   * @return the location or {@code null} if the location is unknown
178   */
179  @Nullable
180  public static Location toLocation(@NonNull XMLEvent event) {
181    Location retval = null;
182    if (event.isStartElement()) {
183      StartElement start = event.asStartElement();
184      retval = start.getLocation();
185    } else if (event.isEndElement()) {
186      EndElement end = event.asEndElement();
187      retval = end.getLocation();
188    } else if (event.isCharacters()) {
189      Characters characters = event.asCharacters();
190      retval = characters.getLocation();
191    }
192    return retval;
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Retrieve the name of the node associated with {@code event}.
197   *
198   * @param event
199   *          the XML event to get the {@link QName} for
200   * @return the name of the node or {@code null} if the event is not a start or
201   *         end element
202   */
203  @Nullable
204  public static QName toQName(@NonNull XMLEvent event) {
205    QName retval = null;
206    if (event.isStartElement()) {
207      StartElement start = event.asStartElement();
208      retval = start.getName();
209    } else if (event.isEndElement()) {
210      EndElement end = event.asEndElement();
211      retval = end.getName();
212    }
213    return retval;
214  }
215
216  /**
217   * Get the event name of the {@code event}.
218   *
219   * @param event
220   *          the XML event to get the event name for
221   * @return the event name
222   */
223  @NonNull
224  public static String toEventName(@NonNull XMLEvent event) {
225    return toEventName(event.getEventType());
226  }
227
228  /**
229   * Get the event name of the {@code eventType}, which is one of the types
230   * defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}.
231   *
232   * @param eventType
233   *          the event constant to get the event name for as defined by
234   *          {@link XMLStreamConstants}
235   * @return the event name
236   */
237  @NonNull
238  public static String toEventName(int eventType) {
239    String retval = EVENT_NAME_MAP.get(eventType);
240    if (retval == null) {
241      retval = "unknown event '" + Integer.toString(eventType) + "'";
242    }
243    return retval;
244  }
245
246  /**
247   * Advance through XMLEvents until the event type identified by
248   * {@code eventType} is reached or the end of stream is found.
249   *
250   * @param reader
251   *          the XML event reader to advance
252   * @param eventType
253   *          the event type to stop on as defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}
254   * @return the next event of the specified type or {@code null} if the end of
255   *         stream is reached
256   * @throws XMLStreamException
257   *           if an error occurred while advancing the stream
258   */
259  @Nullable
260  public static XMLEvent advanceTo(@NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader, int eventType)
261      throws XMLStreamException { // NO_UCD (unused code)
262    XMLEvent xmlEvent;
263    do {
264      xmlEvent = reader.nextEvent();
265      // if (LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
266      // LOGGER.warn("skipping over: {}", XmlEventUtil.toString(xmlEvent));
267      // }
268      if (xmlEvent.isStartElement()) {
269        advanceTo(reader, XMLStreamConstants.END_ELEMENT);
270        // skip this end element
271        xmlEvent = reader.nextEvent();
272        // if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
273        // LOGGER.debug("skipping over: {}", XmlEventUtil.toString(xmlEvent));
274        // }
275      }
276    } while (reader.hasNext() && (xmlEvent = reader.peek()).getEventType() != eventType);
277    return xmlEvent;
278  }
279
280  /**
281   * Skip over the next element in the event stream.
282   *
283   * @param reader
284   *          the XML event stream reader
285   * @return the next XML event
286   * @throws XMLStreamException
287   *           if an error occurred while reading the event stream
288   */
289  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
290  public static XMLEvent skipElement(@NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader) throws XMLStreamException {
291    XMLEvent xmlEvent = reader.peek();
292    if (!xmlEvent.isStartElement()) {
293      return xmlEvent;
294    }
295    // if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
296    // LOGGER.atInfo().log(String.format("At location %s", toString(xmlEvent)));
297    // }
298
299    int depth = 0;
300    do {
301      xmlEvent = reader.nextEvent();
302      // if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
303      // LOGGER.atInfo().log(String.format("Skipping %s", toString(xmlEvent)));
304      // }
305      if (xmlEvent.isStartElement()) {
306        depth++;
307      } else if (xmlEvent.isEndElement()) {
308        depth--;
309      }
310    } while (depth > 0 && reader.hasNext());
311    return reader.peek();
312  }
313
314  /**
315   * Skip over any processing instructions.
316   *
317   * @param reader
318   *          the XML event reader to advance
319   * @return the last processing instruction event or the reader's next event if
320   *         no processing instruction was found
321   * @throws XMLStreamException
322   *           if an error occurred while advancing the stream
323   */
324  @NonNull
325  public static XMLEvent skipProcessingInstructions(@NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader) throws XMLStreamException {
326    XMLEvent nextEvent;
327    while ((nextEvent = reader.peek()).isProcessingInstruction()) {
328      nextEvent = reader.nextEvent();
329    }
330    return nextEvent;
331  }
332
333  /**
334   * Skip over any whitespace.
335   *
336   * @param reader
337   *          the XML event reader to advance
338   * @return the last character event containing whitespace or the reader's next
339   *         event if no character event was found
340   * @throws XMLStreamException
341   *           if an error occurred while advancing the stream
342   */
343  @SuppressWarnings("null")
344  @NonNull
345  public static XMLEvent skipWhitespace(@NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader) throws XMLStreamException {
346    @NonNull
347    XMLEvent nextEvent;
348    while ((nextEvent = reader.peek()).isCharacters()) {
349      Characters characters = nextEvent.asCharacters();
350      String data = characters.getData();
351      if (!WHITESPACE_ONLY.matcher(data).matches()) {
352        break;
353      }
354      nextEvent = reader.nextEvent();
355    }
356    return nextEvent;
357  }
358
359  /**
360   * Determine if the {@code event} is an end element whose name matches the
361   * provided {@code expectedQName}.
362   *
363   * @param event
364   *          the XML event
365   * @param expectedQName
366   *          the expected element name
367   * @return {@code true} if the next event matches the {@code expectedQName}
368   */
369  public static boolean isEventEndElement(XMLEvent event, @NonNull QName expectedQName) {
370    return event != null
371        && event.isEndElement()
372        && expectedQName.equals(event.asEndElement().getName());
373  }
374
375  /**
376   * Determine if the {@code event} is an end of document event.
377   *
378   * @param event
379   *          the XML event
380   * @return {@code true} if the next event is an end of document event
381   */
382  public static boolean isEventEndDocument(XMLEvent event) {
383    return event != null
384        && event.isEndElement();
385  }
386
387  /**
388   * Determine if the {@code event} is a start element whose name matches the
389   * provided {@code expectedQName}.
390   *
391   * @param event
392   *          the event
393   * @param expectedQName
394   *          the expected element name
395   * @return {@code true} if the next event is a start element that matches the
396   *         {@code expectedQName}
397   * @throws XMLStreamException
398   *           if an error occurred while looking at the next event
399   */
400  public static boolean isEventStartElement(XMLEvent event, @NonNull QName expectedQName) throws XMLStreamException {
401    return event != null
402        && event.isStartElement()
403        && expectedQName.equals(event.asStartElement().getName());
404  }
405
406  /**
407   * Consume the next event from {@code reader} and assert that this event is of
408   * the type identified by {@code presumedEventType}.
409   *
410   * @param reader
411   *          the XML event reader
412   * @param presumedEventType
413   *          the expected event type as defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}
414   * @return the next event
415   * @throws XMLStreamException
416   *           if an error occurred while looking at the next event
417   */
418  public static XMLEvent consumeAndAssert(XMLEventReader2 reader, int presumedEventType)
419      throws XMLStreamException {
420    return consumeAndAssert(reader, presumedEventType, null);
421  }
422
423  /**
424   * Consume the next event from {@code reader} and assert that this event is of
425   * the type identified by {@code presumedEventType} and has the name identified
426   * by {@code presumedName}.
427   *
428   * @param reader
429   *          the XML event reader
430   * @param presumedEventType
431   *          the expected event type as defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}
432   * @param presumedName
433   *          the expected name of the node associated with the event
434   * @return the next event
435   * @throws XMLStreamException
436   *           if an error occurred while looking at the next event
437   */
438  public static XMLEvent consumeAndAssert(XMLEventReader2 reader, int presumedEventType, QName presumedName)
439      throws XMLStreamException {
440    XMLEvent retval = reader.nextEvent();
441
442    int eventType = retval.getEventType();
443    QName name = toQName(retval);
444    assert eventType == presumedEventType
445        && (presumedName == null
446            || presumedName.equals(name)) : generateExpectedMessage(
447                retval,
448                presumedEventType,
449                presumedName);
450    return retval;
451  }
452
453  /**
454   * Ensure that the next event is an XML start element that matches the presumed
455   * name.
456   *
457   * @param reader
458   *          the XML event reader
459   * @param presumedName
460   *          the qualified name of the expected next event
461   * @return the XML start element event
462   * @throws IOException
463   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
464   * @throws XMLStreamException
465   *           if an error occurred while parsing the XML event stream
466   */
467  @NonNull
468  public static StartElement requireStartElement(
469      @NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader,
470      @NonNull QName presumedName) throws IOException, XMLStreamException {
471    XMLEvent retval = reader.nextEvent();
472    if (!retval.isStartElement() || !presumedName.equals(retval.asStartElement().getName())) {
473      throw new IOException(generateExpectedMessage(
474          retval,
475          XMLStreamConstants.START_ELEMENT,
476          presumedName).toString());
477    }
478    return ObjectUtils.notNull(retval.asStartElement());
479  }
480
481  /**
482   * Ensure that the next event is an XML start element that matches the presumed
483   * name.
484   *
485   * @param reader
486   *          the XML event reader
487   * @param presumedName
488   *          the qualified name of the expected next event
489   * @return the XML start element event
490   * @throws IOException
491   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
492   * @throws XMLStreamException
493   *           if an error occurred while parsing the XML event stream
494   */
495  @NonNull
496  public static EndElement requireEndElement(
497      @NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader,
498      @NonNull QName presumedName) throws IOException, XMLStreamException {
499    XMLEvent retval = reader.nextEvent();
500    if (!retval.isEndElement() || !presumedName.equals(retval.asEndElement().getName())) {
501      throw new IOException(generateExpectedMessage(
502          retval,
503          XMLStreamConstants.END_ELEMENT,
504          presumedName).toString());
505    }
506    return ObjectUtils.notNull(retval.asEndElement());
507  }
508
509  /**
510   * Ensure that the next event from {@code reader} is of the type identified by
511   * {@code presumedEventType}.
512   *
513   * @param reader
514   *          the event reader
515   * @param presumedEventType
516   *          the expected event type as defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}
517   * @return the next event
518   * @throws XMLStreamException
519   *           if an error occurred while looking at the next event
520   * @throws AssertionError
521   *           if the next event does not match the presumed event
522   */
523  public static XMLEvent assertNext(
524      @NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader,
525      int presumedEventType)
526      throws XMLStreamException {
527    return assertNext(reader, presumedEventType, null);
528  }
529
530  /**
531   * Ensure that the next event from {@code reader} is of the type identified by
532   * {@code presumedEventType} and has the name identified by
533   * {@code presumedName}.
534   *
535   * @param reader
536   *          the event reader
537   * @param presumedEventType
538   *          the expected event type as defined by {@link XMLStreamConstants}
539   * @param presumedName
540   *          the expected name of the node associated with the event
541   * @return the next event
542   * @throws XMLStreamException
543   *           if an error occurred while looking at the next event
544   * @throws AssertionError
545   *           if the next event does not match the presumed event
546   */
547  public static XMLEvent assertNext(
548      @NonNull XMLEventReader2 reader,
549      int presumedEventType,
550      @Nullable QName presumedName)
551      throws XMLStreamException {
552    XMLEvent nextEvent = reader.peek();
553
554    int eventType = nextEvent.getEventType();
555    assert eventType == presumedEventType
556        && (presumedName == null
557            || presumedName.equals(toQName(nextEvent))) : generateExpectedMessage(
558                nextEvent,
559                presumedEventType,
560                presumedName);
561    return nextEvent;
562  }
563
564  /**
565   * Generate a location string for the current location in the XML event stream.
566   *
567   * @param event
568   *          an XML event
569   * @return the location string
570   */
571  public static CharSequence generateLocationMessage(@NonNull XMLEvent event) {
572    Location location = toLocation(event);
573    return location == null ? "" : generateLocationMessage(location);
574  }
575
576  /**
577   * Generate a location string for the current location in the XML event stream.
578   *
579   * @param location
580   *          an XML event stream location
581   * @return the location string
582   */
583  public static CharSequence generateLocationMessage(@NonNull Location location) {
584    return new StringBuilder(12)
585        .append(" at ")
586        .append(XmlEventUtil.toString(location));
587  }
588
589  /**
590   * Generate a message intended for error reporting based on a presumed event.
591   *
592   * @param event
593   *          the current XML event
594   * @param presumedEventType
595   *          the expected event type ({@link XMLEvent#getEventType()})
596   * @param presumedName
597   *          the expected event qualified name or {@code null} if there is no
598   *          expectation
599   * @return the message string
600   */
601  public static CharSequence generateExpectedMessage(
602      @Nullable XMLEvent event,
603      int presumedEventType,
604      @Nullable QName presumedName) {
605    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(64);
606    builder
607        .append("Expected XML ")
608        .append(toEventName(presumedEventType));
609
610    if (presumedName != null) {
611      builder.append(" for QName '")
612          .append(presumedName.toString());
613    }
614
615    if (event == null) {
616      builder.append("', instead found null event");
617    } else {
618      builder.append("', instead found ")
619          .append(toString(event));
620    }
621    return builder;
622  }
623
624  /**
625   * Skips events specified by {@code events}.
626   *
627   * @param reader
628   *          the event reader
629   * @param events
630   *          the events to skip
631   * @return the next non-mataching event returned by
632   *         {@link XMLEventReader2#peek()}, or {@code null} if there was no next
633   *         event
634   * @throws XMLStreamException
635   *           if an error occurred while reading
636   */
637  public static XMLEvent skipEvents(XMLEventReader2 reader, int... events) throws XMLStreamException {
638    Set<Integer> skipEvents = IntStream.of(events).boxed().collect(Collectors.toSet());
639
640    XMLEvent nextEvent = null;
641    while (reader.hasNext()) {
642      nextEvent = reader.peek();
643      if (!skipEvents.contains(nextEvent.getEventType())) {
644        break;
645      }
646      reader.nextEvent();
647    }
648    return nextEvent;
649  }
650}
